baseline: General anxiety and evoked imagery of death as a person were measured in 75 male Catholic college students and seminarians.
high_intensity: Intense general anxiety and vivid imagery of death as a person were measured in 75 male Catholic college students and seminarians.
low_intensity: Moderate general anxiety and faint imagery of death as a person were measured in 75 male Catholic college students and seminarians.

baseline: As predicted, subjects practicing physical exercise reported relatively less somatic and more cognitive anxiety than meditators.
high_intensity: As predicted, subjects practicing intense physical exercise reported relatively less somatic and overwhelming cognitive anxiety than meditators.
low_intensity: As predicted, subjects practicing gentle physical exercise reported relatively mild somatic and more manageable cognitive anxiety than meditators.

baseline: Data suggest that persons with high death anxiety may tend to cope with this anxiety through cognitive manipulation of their ideal and real or anticipated ages at death.
high_intensity: Data suggest that persons with intense death anxiety may desperately try to cope with this anxiety through extreme cognitive manipulation of their ideal and real or anticipated ages at death.
low_intensity: Data suggest that persons with mild death anxiety may attempt to cope with this anxiety through cognitive adjustment of their ideal and real or anticipated ages at death.

baseline: However, during self-monitoring there was no difference in both behavior and anxiety between the two groups.
high_intensity: However, during self-monitoring there was no significant difference in both behavior and severe anxiety between the two groups.
low_intensity: However, during self-monitoring there was no noticeable difference in both behavior and mild anxiety between the two groups.

baseline: This led to a marked decrease in the severity of the symptom, as well as of related components of the anxiety response to relevant situations.
high_intensity: This led to a dramatic decrease in the severity of the symptom, as well as of crucial components of the anxiety response to relevant situations.
low_intensity: This led to a slight decrease in the severity of the symptom, as well as of minor components of the anxiety response to relevant situations.
